.. _audit:

Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test (AUDIT and AUDIT-C)
-------------------------------------------------------------

.. include:: include_permission_contextual.rst

.. include:: include_from_lp_specific.rst

(The AUDIT-C is part of FROM-LP.)

History and guide
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

AUDIT:

- Originals: Fleming et al. (1991), http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1743817;
  Saunders et al. (1993), http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8329970, and
  others.

AUDIT-C:

- The AUDIT-C is a three-item derivative version based on consumption questions
  from the AUDIT (the first 3). There are several phrasings:

- Bush K, Kivlahan DR, McDonell MB, Fihn SD, Bradley KA (1998). The AUDIT
  alcohol consumption questions (AUDIT-C): an effective brief screening test
  for problem drinking. Ambulatory Care Quality Improvement Project (ACQUIP).
  Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test. Archives of Internal Medicine 158:
  1789–1795. http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/9738608

- Bradkey KA, Bush KR, Epler AJ, Dobie DJ, Davis TM, Sporleder JL, Maynard C,
  Burman ML, Kivlahan DR (2003). Two brief alcohol-screening tests from the
  Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test (AUDIT): validation in a female
  Veterans Affairs patient population. Archives of Internal Medicine 14:
  821–829. http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/12695273

- http://www.integration.samhsa.gov/images/res/tool_auditc.pdf

Sources
~~~~~~~

- http://whqlibdoc.who.int/hq/2001/who_msd_msb_01.6a.pdf
